Content: Pro traders arent any better at predicting where the market will go than a hobby trader and its not the job. The difference is all in execution Finding lvls protecting profits once available stopping out  adjusting when wrong and consistant loss size control. Focus there

Levels respecting precisely today in #ES_F. 559388 was sell target as posted and weve hit it and now spent 1.5hrs bouncing here. This is a big inflection zone. Bulls will need to recover 561520 now to set a more sustained low.  559388 fails we take another leg down to 5543

Its the best session volatility wise since #ES_F bottomed 11 days ago but the real moves come tomorrow. Levels respecting precisely 559388 was sell target as posted and we hit exact and bounced.  Bulls need to push fast here. 5578 5543 below. 561520 must reclaim to rally

Bidirectional price action is back in #ES_F at least for the day after 11 days of grind up. After tagging 5662 resistance I posted 561520 had to reclaim to rally. It did and we got to 5630 then sold.  Same drill now 561520 must reclaim to trigger up 559388next support.

Price finally woke up from its low volatility grind in #ES_F and presenting good twoway setups. 5662 was target #1 this morning. We sold off there. I posted 561520 had to reclaim to rally we reclaimed and 15 points  No change 5643 5652 5662 next above. 561520support

Price #ES_F is waking up slightly from its 11 day low volatility grind up mode good to see but all noise until Jackson Hole tomorrow at 10am. It began after tagging 5662 1st target today which was July 18th peak.  558894 next support down 561520 must reclaim to rally

A rare dip continues in #ES_F and good to see after 11 days of upside. 5662 was 1st rally target today and we hit and sold. 5630 561520 were pullback targets. Arriving at 1520 now  We dont sell sustainably until 561520 fails 5587 1st down. 5630 must recover now to pop

After running to 5662 first target today in #ES_F dip underway. 5630 weak almost here 561520 are supports for it as posted.   For the 11 days straight all dips have been bought and this will continue until a support cracks in this case 561520. Bulls control until then

Micro dip in #ES_F finally after tagging todays first target at 5662. Ultimately we are now just waiting for Jackson Hole tomorrow at 10am. 5630 weaker 561520 are now supports from here.   561520 now the bullbear line and bears need to crack that to break the rally cycle.

Price wasting no time as the grind continues. I provided 3 targets 5662 5672 5680. 5662 just tagged. For those in new longs  the drill is the same  lock in gains let a risk free runner go. Until volatility increases hopefully soon nothing to do but ride runners in #ES_F

Its Day 11 of trend in #ES_F. Yesterday my final target off 5612 was was 5651 and we hit it 3 times now 11am 2pm  just now. Just keep holding those long runners here until it ends.  No change 5662 5672 5680 next if ES wants. 5630 weak 5615support. We sell5615 only

Closing update #ES_F Ultra precise technicals today. 5651 was rally target #3 and we hit it to the exact tick  sold concluding a successful session. New structure forming 56125650 now to setup next leg. Newsletter out soon talking where I am entering tradecompanion.substack.com

And theres another three level run in #ES_F just like this morning. After the 5612 defense I posted three targets for this rally leg 5636 hit 5642 hit 5651 and we are at 5651 now. From here just sit on the runner all bonus  5662 5674 then on to ATHs. Sell5612

For the 2nd time today we got a two level move in #ES_F. As posted bulls had to defend 5612 to keep 3 targets live. We held 5612 and 5636 hit 5642 just hit 5651. As always lock in gains level to level leave a runner.  5651 next if ES wants then 5674. Sell only5612

Back up the levels we go in #ES_F and 5636 first target up tagged. Bulls had to hold 5612 on the pullback to keep the leg up going as posted and they did. Remember though no greed lock in here let a runner go.  5642 5651 5672 next if ES wants. Sell only if 5612 fails

Good level to level action. As warned 56305612 is noise with 5630 being a multimonth trap zone. I gave 3 breakout targets with 5651 being third  we hit it sold  to 5612 bounced. This is why lvl to lvl is essential  No change. 5636 5642 5651 when #ES_F ready. Dip5612

The easy trading for the day is done in #ES_F. I gave t3 targets this morning 5636 5642 5651. We spiked to 5651 sold. Now protect profits. As I warned for 2 days 5630 is a multimonth trap zone. 56305612noise  Bulls must hold 5612 to keep this going. Dip 56045598 below

Incredible follow through in #ES_F and we got a 3 target run. Todays targets were 5636 hit 5642 hit 5651 hit then sold. As warned this is why we always lock in profits level to level no greed with profits.  No change. 5612 now support must hold or we dip 56045598.

Slow start but we finally got two target hits in #ES_F. First target was 5636 hit. Second was 5642 hit. If long lock in gains here level to level let a runner go. Never get greedy with profits protect them.  5651 next then 5674 if ES has energy. Same supports. Sell5612

5630 was my major target this week and #ES_F agrees. Its a big multimonth level that was support in early July. It will be a battleground all week. Tested 6x from below  No change. 56305612chop. Keeps 5636 5642 5651 live. 5612 fails data at 10am2pm today we finally dip
